pr_title: Create Mock of zOSMF to be used on the Wash CICD

timeline.message:
Initial version of the Mock service for zOSMF

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Merge branch 'master' into rip/zosmf/mock

# Conflicts:
#	integration-tests/src/test/java/org/zowe/apiml/gatewayservice/authentication/ZosmfAuthenticationLoginIntegrationTest.java

Sign the JWT token with the valid key

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Don't try to run Passticket dependant tests outside of MF

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Valid behavior in case the zOSMF is called through

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Passticket related tests run only on MF

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>
Merge branch 'master' into rip/zosmf/mock

Merge branch 'rip/zosmf/mock' into jb892003/pipeline/master_issues

Merge branch 'master' into jb892003/pipeline/master_issues

timeline.bodyText: clean code point: i'd make the mock aparent from the sid
timeline.author: jandadav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+services:
+    - serviceId: zosmf  # unique lowercase ID of the service

replies.bodyText: I have renamed at least the file. It should help
replies.author: balhar-jakub

timeline.bodyText: because just reading this should tell it's a mock
timeline.author: jandadav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@ apiml:
         discoveryServiceUrls: https://localhost:10011/eureka/
     security:
         auth:
-            provider: dummy
+            provider: zosmf

replies.bodyText:
I get it but it may bring some issues
ZOSMF("zosmf","zosmfAuthenticationProvider"),
Here I thing there is no reasonable way to change it.
replies.author: balhar-jakub
